text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityClass where concept is-a RGRP

name: EntityClassGroup
title: EntityClassGroup
description: A grouping of resources (personnel, material, or places) to be used for scheduling purposes. May be a pool of like-type resources, a team, or combination of personnel, material and places.
